title: OnePlus 6 Review - My Daily Driver!
description: The new OnePlus 6 is an awesome smartphone with a ton of advanced features and an amazing camera.  But is it really that much of an improvement over the Oneplus 5T or are you better off waiting for the obvious Oneplus 6T?    Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  NZXT H700i (Sponsor):   OP6 Case (Carbon):   OP6 Case (Colored):     OP6 Case (Rugged):   OP6 Case (Anti Shock):   OP6 Case (Black TPU):     Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by OnePLus. This video is sponsored by NZXT. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (buy from Amazon):  Panasonic GH5 -  Panasonic GH4 -  Panasonic G7 -  Canon C100 -  Sony RX100m3 -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #oneplus6 #hardwarecanucks
transcript: it's time delivery all right thanks whoo all right good people so it is time for the oneplus 6 hi I'm looking for a case well look no further I got this beauty the age 700 i buy NZXT with integrated RGB lighting and built-in fan control the age 700 I this one's for you I'll take it alright so the oneplus 6 for me has been sort of a mixed experience from the beginning this is my first notched phone I don't really like the glass back the included screen protector is super soft and I recommend removing it for a far superior touch interface and for the first week this thing was super to view the notifications but it is not secure and will unlock with like a face print out it does not recognize me with a hat and it even unlocks at like extreme angles like this where I would not be and speakerphone are totally fine no complaints here just don't cover the single speaker at the bottom the headphone jack is actually quite powerful really good to drive headphones and I don't mind 19 by 9 aspect ratio it's still a pentile matrix but I'm not complaining it's a good panel with D blacks and color calibration available I keep mine on the p3 profile for that slightly natural saturation boost the clock is now on the left side of the knotch and I've actually gone to like the black space despite how the proportions feel off like that slight angle on the sides that doesn't really match the curvature of the corners but hiding the notch is of course an option and one way to revive the freshness of the device the only complaint here though the top curvature does not match the bottom corners when the notch is hidden but I'm really happy that we have per app control of how the notch is used in full screen mode so for example I don't mind the not being there all the time except for video playback because you know the left side just looks terrible so I can disable the knotch for example just for YouTube and enjoy my full experience there without the knotch but exiting per app activation or gaming mode that disables notifications and overall the touch interface feels great but there are slowdowns when launching the camera from the lockscreen it just takes a you know second too long to load for some reason and 4 out of the 5 times I hear the unlock sound effect before the screen wakes up giving me the perception of lag now I found that if I disable the face unlock I can get into the camera quicker and unlocks my phone faster - it's like almost instantaneous you don't have the lag in the sound effect you no delay so potentially disable the face unlock to get a smoother experience now me handling cameras all day I like with the Oneplus 6 captures it maintains the right amount of contrast and color with good dynamic range but keep away from harsh light because it flares easily and can ruin photos the portrait mode is fantastic subject isolation is excellent while keeping the same field of view and I use this all the time for that fancy camera look the selfie cam was decent but it's not good for group shots as it naturally blurs out the background so I'm the only one in focus all the time and we also now have this portrait mode for selfie cam
